tags: None
review:
Writing a review for this doctor is very difficult to be expressed in words but still i would share my story here with this doctor.I got to know about this doctor from one of my family doctor in Kolkata.So as i was not in Hyderabad i mailed this doctor about my mom's right knee pain with her previous medical prescriptions and x-rays. After he saw that mail we had a telecommunications and i got confidence on this doctor and book a flight to hyderabad from Kolkata with my parents. After examining my Mom thoroughly and doing some tests he suggested total knee replacement for my Mom, but we got very scared as per some other relatives comments who had done their surgery somewhere else and operation was not successful. When i shared their story with this doctor he directly sent me to a patient whome he had just operated 2 weeks back and came to hospital on that day for stitch removal. So we went to that gentleman and took his very good reviews on the operation done by this doctor and he was also able to move and bend his leg for a full flexion just after 2 weeks of his both knee replacement done. The doctor also sent us to a patient in ot recovery room who was walking first time just after 4 hours  of his knee t replacement done.After seeing all this we got confidence and went for a total knee replacement surgery for my Mom s right knee. After the operation doctor made her walk just after 4 hours of her surgery and from next day her Physiotherapy got started in the hospital. The highest pain for my Mom after the surgery was 3 out of 10, that too after doing Physiotherapy ,which was quite less for her rather than previous knee pain.

Now it has been 2 weeks and my mom is now walking without any Walker support. She also went upstairs just at the second day of her operation. Now her painkiller is also just paracetamol and no heavy painkiller is prescribed to her still she won't be complaining about any pain to me even after her Physiotherapy.

It is actually my mom's words to every person who is having a knee pain and need a knee replacement but not doing so by thinking that it may get failed and tolerating this pain they all should go to this doctor and made this operation done by him if needed.

In a word i can tell this doctor is the most transparent, responsive, helpful , friendly person in this earth i have ever met as a doctor.*** ***** *** ***** ******* *** ** * **** **** ** ** ********* ** *** *** *** ****** ** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi my name is Kiran Kaviti I went to Sunil sir for scaphoid fracture treatment, many orthopedics from top hospitals asked me to go for surgery but Sunil sir cured me without surgery, ***** *** ** **** ********** ** ********** highly qualified and very kind hearted. Patiently listens to the problems. Others orthopedics simply say do exercises but sir will personally show you how to do the exercise.
As I trust only him I again visited Sunil sir for my knee pain, he checked in his ways and said there is no problem he gave me medicines for 15days, now my knee is fine. Honestly I suggest everyone who have any orthopedic issues mist visit this doctor once.

tags: None
review: ** ***** ** *** *** **** ********** ******* ** *** **** ******* *** ******* I just got operated last week. Still I am in process of recovery. It will take another 50 day for full recovery. When I admitted in the hospital with broken leg... something is running in my mind that am I in safe hands .. when I met Dr sunil 50% of pain has gone with his smile and initial discussion the way he talked. He explained every thing very clearly about the treatment and successfully surgery has been performed. I would write this review after my full recovery but I don't you to miss this nice doctor. Don't miss him... diagnosis is minimum for a doctor to understand. That too diagnosis is performing to our body not to others..it's better to have a deep diagnosis once to make our self satisfied.

tags: None
review: i had ACL tear while playing cricket, i consulted many doctors in major hospitals but i was not convinced with any of them, then i started online search for specialist in sports injuries, then i saw Dr.Sunil dachepalli sirs profile and his experience sports medicine, and took a appointment with him, he examined me thoroughly explained me the difference and consequences of not getting the surgery done, now it"s been almost five months from surgery, now i"m able to play cricket, nice doctor, i will recommend all my family and friends to Dr.Sunil sir for any orthopaedic issue

tags: None
review: I was just looking for the appointment as I have got some neck pain and came across some of the feedbacks about Dr. sunil !! I'm basically from Visakhapatnam and I visit only Sunil if I have some issues related to pain just because he is the best of all I have ever met !! I met with accident long back in 2013 and was taken to Image hospitals where doctors said it's nothing just scratches on body !!! I met sunil @ innovate clinic and just because of his diagnosis I understood that I have minor francture . he has suffered some medicines and fitness activities I need to follow for speed recover and they worked well .. . My wife has pain in joints and we consulted many doctors but no one diagnosed what was wrong .!! We met sunil last month and she is perfect now ... Don't want to meet sunil again as I don't want to fall ill.. but I would definitely rcomend his name for one of the finest orthopedic doctor in India

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ***** ********** ** *** ** *** **** ************ ** *** ***** He is cheerful and listens to your complaints patiently and makes you feel really comfortable. He operated me for a fracture, which was successful. I recovered and resumed day to day activities very soon, much to the surprise of people around me. He and his team are extremely approachable and friendly. His team goes the extra mile by answering queries even offline, which I found really helpful. Cheers to the medical fraternity for their service especially during COVID times.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dear viewers
Iam Ananndarao B from kphb Hyderabad is sharing my experience. Three years back I had a surgery to my left leg i.e.  ligament tear and mencious repair with doctor Sunil dachepaaly.  ** ** *** **** ****** ** *** ***** ******* ** ****** ********* ***** I really appreciate and thankful to the doctor because the way he talked to me and approached me in a fantastic manner.  Iam walking now without any hassle ness.  Iam recommending him as a best among others as for as orthopaedic problems are concerned.  Thanking you 
B. Ananndarao ** **** ****** ** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My name is Mrs.Amina khatun and i am from dhaka,bangladesh.i had a history of both knee pains from last so many years, i visited so many doctors at my place but i was not satisfied with there treatment .My son heard about Dr .Sunil Dachepalli so from online so we came to india for sir treatment.After getting in contact with sir i felt really happy and he explained my problem very clearly and advised for the knee replacement.I underwent bilateral knee replacement on 5th of July. Dr.Sunil Dachepalli made me to walk on the other day ,as he said after one week i was really feeling better there was not much pain.now i am able to do my all the normall activities without hesitating.I am thankfull to Dr.Sunil Dachepalli for making me to walk.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** *** **** ************* * **** *******. I had an ACL ligament tear on the left knee and underwent orthoscopy surgery. I went to Yashoda Somajiguda hospital only because Dr. Sunil Sir works there. He is friendly, genuine, approachable, practical and knowledgeable Doctor with his ever smiling face. I was super nervous about my surgery since it was for the first time for me. But Dr. Sunil Sir boosted my confidence and made me feel lighter. He is not at all  commrcial like some of the doctors we usually find. I owe a debt of gratitude to him for his prompt response and valuable treatment. If you are planning to visit this doctor, without any second thoughts, please visit and get treated. All the Best!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ***** ** ****** ******* ************* *** **  ************* *** *** * **** *** *** ******* Based on our experience, I would highly recommend Dr. Sunil. My mother was suffering from acute shoulder pain, which other doctors were finding tricky to diagnose as it present along with Bell's palsy. Dr. Sunil was able to get to the root cause of the issue quickly, consulting with neurologist and endocrinologist to get a complete picture. He recommended the right physiotherapy and medicines, which led to a speedy recovery.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: The explanation given by doctor is good and he is very friendly.  However,  he has been cancelling all appointments that we're scheduled for the last 3-4 weeks which is affecting the problem since it is not fully resolved. This also wastes our time as we come to know of some cancellations while at the hospital. Although we were happy to find this doctor during our first two meetings,  we are forced to look for another one as we need a follow up meeting urgently.  Dr. Dachepalli, we hope that you look into this

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr.sunil dachepalli is  an excellent surgeon.I would surely recommend . my  son has undergone key hole surgery for the right knee for the extra growth of the lateral menescoid. he was the only doctor who could do the minimally invasive option which means he doesnâ€™t cut muscles and has less tissue and nerve damage. He genuinely cares about his patients well-being and recovery. My son has very fast recovery and he was comfortable after the two days of surgery.Previously he  has undergone the same to the left knee with another doctor but took 15 days for recovery. He was also the only doctor I met with that was explained. we are really grateful for him and wish that his healing hands should further cure people in pain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We approached Yashoda Hospitals,Hyderabad ,India to visit Dr Sunil Dachepalli{Consultant Orthopaedic Surgeon} from Chittagong,Dhaka,Bangladesh.This Doctor's name is referred to us through one of his older Bangladeshi patient who underwent right THR procedure in the year 2016. My wife-Mrs.Senowara Begum has been evaluated for Osteoarthritis of left Knee Joint in my country.She was recommended only medical management always.But we were disappointed with the usage of Pain Killers everytime.Finally we could get the contact of Dr.Sunil who gave us the permanent solution for the current condition.She has been evaluated and treated surgically by the procedure-Total Knee Replacement procedure.My wife is doing much better now and we together appreciate the treatment and Services provided by the Consultant's Team. Thanks a lot for the treatment rendered.We would rather help our relations /friends in our native place to reach Dr Sunil sir who is facing such problems-arthritis etc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I came here with a comlaints of pain in right knee and swelling over right ankle since 2 months ,faced difficulty while walking,consulted so many doctors regarding it but no one gave the correct diagnosis .I heard about sir from my friend and came for consultation.i am happy with Dr Sunil Dachepalli sir friendliness behaviour..he examined thoroughly and advised for few tests..got consulted with those test and he expalined the actual cause of my pain and explained the benifits of getting operated.Got operated and now i really feel happy after getting operated,no pain at all and i can do my day to day activity normally.I am happy with Dr Sunil Dachepalli sir team and his treatment and also his friendliness behaviour.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am student from Somalia and currently doing my Uni in Hyderabad. I fell down and injured my right knee ligamentâ€”ACL. I had been having difficulty walking and my knee would give off and click. I heard a lot about Dr.Sunil Dachepalli and approached him. He was very methodical in examining and infact kept the MRI films aside before examining me. You see people Like this rarely. He explained everything clearly to me including bone models. I appreciate the amount of time taken by him. I walked the same day of my surgery. I really thank Gul to Dr.Sunil and his team. Anyone with Sports or Ligament injuries, ** ** *** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My dad couldn't walk for almost  2 years due to pain in his hip. He came all the way from Somalia after we heard about Dr.Sunil Dachepalli. The doctor thoroughly examined my father and did appropriate tests.  He underwent Hip Replacement and walked the very next day. We are indebted to Dr.Sunil who made my dad walk in 1 day after surgery. We appreciated his experience and I understand that he has lot of experience in Joint replacements. He is a thorough gentle man and very friendly to talk with. We do not hesitate to recommend him to my fellow country people. God bless him.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: I visited the docter as i always thought he had good advice, I went back to him as i had been suffering from shoulder pain + neck pain which he was aware of. I have been as per his advice visiting a physiotherapist to strengthen my shoulders but couldn't keep the appointments in recent past due to financial issues. Recently at work I have had to carry a heavy weight laptop back and forth, I walk a kilometer with it everyday, and my shoulders hurt and i was afraid that I would worsen the cramps in my shoulders and i went to the docter to get a certificate so i can either take a light weight computer or a trolley instead of a bag. ( as a safety net before can earn the money needed to strengthen my shoulders) I paid for the consultation, but never got a certificate, as the doctor assumed and berated me for behaving like an old woman etc... He never listened to the issue.   He kept going on about wanting me to get back to normal life as if i dont want that.. As a  single woman living alone, I do everything i can to be strong enough to carry out my daily chores, and the docter had no right to judge, berate me. He wasted my money, my time and broke my trust.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ****** ******* *** *** *** ****** ** ***. When we were planning to do total knee replacement of both legs of my wife, literally we were full with confusion as well as risk. We asked many individuals regarding this treatment, some are successful some are not. 
When we met Dr Sunil. His confidence regarding total knee replacement was so high. After 1st meeting itself we decided for total knee replacement for both legs. He is not only a great doctor but also a remarkable person. His behavior and politeness is fantastic. Here I'll add other supportive doctors also, all are very generous and caring. Added one more doctor name Dr Anusha, She is like very close to every patient. Her carness and behavior is like family person.
Then we were afraid of doing knee replacement for both legs within a period of 15 days. But now even we can't believe that all the operation and treatment has accomplished. 
It is like miracle, only because of Dr Sunil ; Yoshada Hospital- Samajiguda.
Now we are much satisfied with treatment.
Thank you for your service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Extremly talented and friendly doctor . It's really important during times of treatment that your doctor gives you courage and confidence to go through the treatment process . Dr Sunil is extremely talented and receives his patients with utmost care . My mother got her femure fracture surgery done with Dr Sunil and she's recovered well .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went for leg fracture treatment and doctor was so cool and calm. He listens to patient completely.makes sure he answers all the questions and gives comfort to that , what ever problem you have can be heeled sson and nothing to worry much...If I would have not went to him for treatment, god knows what would have happen to my leg now. Now I am able to play cricket and do all everything normally... Thank you so much sir .**** *** *** *****

tags: None
review: First of all he makes you so much comfortable you don't feel like you're talking to doctor. Also he suggests Diagnostics centers near to you unlike others who has their preferred centers. He explains everything in detail. I'd recommend him for critical ortho issue's.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I am unhappy with his response. I had shoulder blade pain and visited him. He didn't even listen to my problem completely, instead he told me to get admit and do MRI. I paid Rs 500 just for a min consultation and came out. Then i consulted another ortho surgeon, he listened to my problem clearly and told me that the pain may be due to wrong sleeping position. He gave medicine for 5 days and advised me to sleep in a proper position. Now i am ********** alright.

tags: None
review: *** ** *** **** ****** **** **** **** I was so worried when my son's arm bone broke into two halves. Mr.Sunil was so supportive and also his PA Aneesh who walked us through at every single stage on what to do where to come, who will help etc which we are very thankful to them for. Above all arranging OT at a very short notice , completing the procedure and discharging the same day as my son responded pretty well not complaining of any pain. Thanks a million to you sir for all the support.

tags: None
review: We have had the pain during our visit to Melbourne where we have shown to a GP but could not get to any conclusion in terms of treatment even after taking a scan of the arm. Dr Sunil has a look at the same scan and suggested few blood tests after which he has prescribed medication for inflammation. Satisfied with overall experience as I could immediately start medication on the path to recovery.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
As I fell off the bike and my ACL was torn, I saw some of Dr.Sunil 's videos in YouTube and strongly thought that I should get operated by this doctor garu.
I visited Dr.Sunil dachepally garu in March 2022 for ACL reconstruction. 
Sir explained the problem and the need for the surgery.He gives us strength to overcome the fear of surgery.I underwent surgery on April 7th and right now iam doing good.I strongly recommend Dr.Sunil for any kind of surgery* ****** ** ****** * ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
The doc was very friendly and supportive, everything was awesome!! 
One issue is the management, they donâ€™t have time sense, no time management, the doctor was down to earth whereas his PA was rude!! I would rather visit him in Yashoda hospital than in this clinic. The clinic sucks!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I did book the Dr. Sunil from Practo but my mom was following him in YouTube. I wonder why she is watching more videos about him. Here is the answer,He is excellent in explaining the issue, gave the confidence, helpful information, great patience, no rush in talking gave enough time to talk and listen. My mom was super happy and me too. 

Highly recommended doctor Dr. Sunil Dachecpalli.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had undergone revision ACL and meniscus repair surgery. Best part was, I was able to walk with confidence 2-3 days post surgery, compared to about 3-4 weeks in my previous ACL surgery(5 years back). Minimal pain and excellent post surgery medication and physio protocol of the dr is helping me in my recovery. Optimistic of the recovery path, cant wait to get back to my sports.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr.Sunil was a great person. I consulted him for an opinion and he was very patient in hearing my entire incident and then suggesting me a better choice explaining the reason behind his opinion.
Many doctors consulted before Sunil sir simply recommend surgery irrespective of explaining the need for it. However Dr.Sunil gave me a right advice with proper justification. 

Thankyou Sir !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: **** ****** clear all my doubts, with patience and advised me for better fast recovery of problem, *** ** ** *** **** * **** ****** *  **** **** good human being as I said I am working  in Indian army he straight told his assistant to refund my op charges  which ever I paid... Thanks for the concern doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ****** *** ********** He listened patiently and calmly while I told him the history of the issue and symptoms. He answered all my concerns and explained his treatment protocol. ** ****** ******* *** *********** ************** *** explained each one. I am very happy with his approach to patient care and treatment modalities. In fact, for most patients including myself, the condition is half cured when your doctor is calm and caring. Five stars.
reply_text: Thank you Kakuli for your kind words. We aim to continue the same care that we provided in London for almost 10years. Have a good day.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor was friendly and had enough patience to understand the problem. Suggested necessary precautionary action items. 

In Addition, Dr Sravani ( physio ) was helpful as well. She was enough kind to us and friendly . Thanks to her as well who helped me during off hours to identify about medicines.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Initially we have visited for heel pain. He suggested for few tests and exercises along with little medicine. Now almost free from heel pain, since we are visiting regularly for orthopedic problems. Doctor is very friendly, patience and explains problems clearly. I recommend this doctor  highly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am glad that I opted for  Dr.Sunil to treat my wife's knee. She had an ACL tear when she met with an accident. Dr.Sunil was very helpful while diagnosing the problem and post operation the recovery was also very fast. Thanks to Dr.sunil and his assistant Dr.Anusha for taking care of my wife. Very happy with the progress she is making. Swaroop (Deloitte)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Sunil welcomes you with broad smile on face and give us very good suggestion and what is best for treatment.
He cares the patient with love and affection.
He will advice post operative instructions and will also explain how the surgery is going to be done.and risks invloved post surgery. Explains how to take care of knee post surgery.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: poor experience, won't recommendI explained him on first visit that pain is because of some gym injury. he didn't explained anything and advised few medicines, on my second visit doctor prescribed more medicines and few tests from his recommended lab.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is well experienced in knee replacement surgery. My wife had both her knees replaced, and is now able to walk freely without any pain or discomfort. I'd highly recommend Dr.Sunil Dacahapalli for anyone looking to get treated for knee pain and other bone related problems. The doctor is friendly and answers all the queries with clarity and patience.

tags: None
review: Very professional. Listened to my problems,  checked well.  Took tests before identifying my problem.  Thr overall cost shot above the roof in terms of MRI,  x-ray, and finally the treatment medicines.  I'm hoping for a speedy recovery and getting back to playing cricket again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Here I am giving a brief history of my problem and the solution given by dr. I met with an accident in Oct 2020 and got to know have to go to ACL reconstruction for my right knee...which was per performed in NOV 2020 in private hospital by in experienced not worthy doctor which leads to inability to walk or bending of my knee.it took nearly five months to proper walk or bend my knee.
Then suddenly my knee was swollen with heavy pain ....I visited the same hospital with same surgeon he again performed a surgery by saying I got infection in my knee.. after a month still i didn't got relief than I got to know about DR . Sunil Dachepalli ** *** **** *** * ***** * his nature and friendliness gave me confidence that my problem can be cured. He is a highly professional with vast  knowledge. He treated my problem very well.
I am very much happy. I surely suggest him for any problems related orthopaedic. ** ** *** ** *** *** *********** ****** ** ****** 
Thank you DR. SUNIL DACHEPALLI.

tags: None
review:
My brother met with an accident. His left leg got swelled, we visited nearby Continental hospital. They chilled our spine, saying this case is very complicated and he need to be admitted urgently, some senior doc will come to do surgery. 
We were very scared, and then i thought to have another consultation. I looked at practo to find any Orthopedics nearby to us, and so found Dr Sunil.
He is such a genius. We went to him scared, but came very relaxed. He examined his condition and cured my brother without any surgery or operation. He now walks seamlessly. 

Thank you Dr Sunil.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Sunil Dachepalli is very friendly receiving of the patients and with gentle and humble with smily talking with the patients by knowing their ailments. 

He simply with high latest knowledge orientation he educate and explain the patient the Real Problem and properly guide the patient what to DO and when to DO the treatment.
I noticed he is very energetic and never show restlessness on his face from morning 8 a.m. to night 8 p.m. with the patients.

He is a Very Nice Doctor and he is asset to the Yashoda do have one of the such kind of Doctors in Place.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He is excellent surgeon and having a huge name and fame in our area as he has treated number of people with torn Acl and Pcl.Also he is excellent in performing knee replacements. I also went to him for Acl reconstruction after listening his way of treatments and successful recoveries. Although he is very busy person as he has to perform number of surgeries every day but he listens and understands problem very quickly. He is a atlas trainer and was training junior surgeons during my surgery and made me very comfortable during and after surgery.I walked with support next day after surgery and left the support on the second day.The physiotherapy assistance was excellent, the pain management was so good that i have felt a very little pain during the whole of stay in hospital. Now i could walk and jog confidently but i have to work more on thigh wasting to return to sports.The doctor has done his job in  excellent manner

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had a  ACL Tear during my college days back in 2007. I haven't undergone knife as there are not many experienced doctors in Hyderabad. I met Dr. Sunil along with my friend for his father's knee replacement consultation. I was impressed by the way he talks and makes the patient very comfortable. Very rarely you would see someone with good skills and knowledge.  Here is the reason for my statement

After few months i did visit him for ankle related issues and he tracked out that due to ligament tear I've started putting weight and pressure on my left leg. He gave me confidence to go under knife and it helped me also after that i've lost about 12kgs and feeling young and fresh. 

Later i've taken my aunt and uncle for knee replacements both were happy. All my interactions and insurgencies under him went well.

Thanks Dr.DC keep smiling.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr.Sunil has been very helpful in my mother Knee replacement. After doing a lot of research googling and finding best doctors in knee replacement found Dr. Sunil reference. I inquired and one of my colleague had a bad sports injury and she explained how she got it rectified from Dr.Sunil. She went to several surgeons but as she could not get correct treatment her knee was still bad and Dr. Sunil helped her to recovery completely. I was confident even before visiting Dr. Sunil that he would help in my mother Knee replacement. My mother was 67 and was afraid but after speaking to him she was confident and wanted to go for surgery. She has successfully operated for her left knee replacement and is doing fine. He remembers his patients very well. Dr. Sunil and his team helped in recovery of my mother quickly. His friendly welcome and also confidence really helps patients to get the surgery done with out fear. Thanks a lot to Dr. Sunil.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi i have reached this doc,for my mother purpose coz of her knee pains from last 8 years.This doc is very friendly ,listens and responds to patients politely.My mother was advised Total knee replacement but coz of her over weight we didn't dare to go ahead.This doc has given full support = which raised the confidence in my mother  and she accepted for the surgery.As listed in other feedback not every patient was treated same,depends on there health and other conditions  medications and steps are taken.As my mother is obese so she was asked to walk on next day.It has been a month ,the operation was done ,now she is good and able to walk.Even his support teams also responds  very nicely.
A very big THANKS to him.

reply_text: Dear Ms. Lyla, I just had an opportunity to see your feedback. My apologies if I couldn't stand up to your expectations. I am surprised to see your comment about referring to specific diagnostic centres. I usually ask everybody where they live and suggest places closer to them, I do not have personal interest in any of the diagnostic centres. But I suggest some places which are not worth your money if you ask for those centres. After having vast Orthopaedic experience ( Almost 19 plus years) I try to investigate if required. If I can't diagnose your condition the first time and keep asking you to visit me again and again, I don't think it's convenient for you. I can only treat appropriately based on the correct diagnosis rather than giving you blanket medication. If you still feel that you didn't get appropriate management , you can have free consultation again.
